description:
Everything You Know About MongoDB is Wrong - PyCon Italia 2022

MongoDB is webscale, right? It’s a JSON database, it’s eventually
consistent. Oh, and it’s insecure.

Let me clear up some things: MongoDB is an ACID-compliant database with
transactions, schemas & relationships. It includes a powerful
aggregation query language. MongoDB doesn’t store JSON, and nowadays it
comes with pretty good security defaults (we think).

I’ll cover all of this and more, so you know what you need to, if you’re
considering MongoDB for your next (or current) project.

Speaker: Mark Smith
title: Everything You Know About MongoDB is Wrong
